Brief

This gave me a chance to use the popular Omega 960 , which is a responsive HTML5 base theme targeted at mobile devices. I wanted to give the new site a minimilistic look and feel.. I had some feedback about my old logo being a bit hard to read so i decided to ditch that.

Hope you like!
